game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the mischievous pixie.
game.description: A valuable gemstone has gone missing in the village of Willowdale. The villager who owned it, Mrs. White, is frantic and asks for your help in retrieving the stolen item.

task.objective: Gather information about the pixie's lair location.
task.description: Speak to the village elder, who might have some insight into where the mischievous pixie is hiding.

task.objective: Infiltrate the pixie's lair and retrieve the stolen gemstone.
task.description: Sneak into the pixie's lair, avoiding its pranks and traps. Once inside, find the gemstone and return it to Mrs. White.
